metadata.title: CVE-2021-41771 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: ImportedSymbols in debug/macho (for Open or OpenFat) in Go before 1.16.10 and 1.17.x before 1.17.3 Accesses a Memory Location After the End of a Buffer, aka an out-of-bounds slice situation.

notes.note: amurray> No other packages in the Ubuntu archive appear to call File.ImportedSymbols() at all let alone on arbitrary input files so setting the priority of this CVE to low.

criterions.comment: golang-1.15 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.16 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
golang-1.17 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
